column2: # load the full dataset for the demographic statistics
ss16full <- read.table("ss2016sub-ao.csv", sep=",", header = TRUE, row.names = 1 )

ss16 <- read.table("ss2016final.csv", sep=",", header = TRUE, row.names = 1 )
